items.sentence: Tom has already been told he doesn't need to do that.
Tom obviously wasn't worried about what might happen.
Tom tore down the fence between his house and Mary's.
We keep our clean towels in a closet in the bathroom.
I'm absolutely certain this is where I parked my car.
You need to take some responsibility for the problem.
We don't want to keep doing this if we don't have to.
Tom stuck out his tongue to try and catch snowflakes.
Tom, my feet are freezing. Please get me my slippers.
Mr. Jackson never loses his temper with his students.
